name: Hurricane
summary: Deals damage, and has a 30% chance of confusing the target. The move cannot miss in the rain and is 50% in sun. Deals double damage if the target is in the semi-invulnerable state of Fly, Bounce, and Sky Drop. Can hit non-adjacent opponents in Triple Battles.
viability: Hurricane is a great Pokemon for Flying-types who are specially inclined, such as Mega Pidgeot. While the accuracy is a pain to deal with, its power is well worth the investment. Not surprisingly, Hurricane users shine on rain-based teams.
